Text: New Investor Relations Contact for ETS Cc Leboe will be the new investor relations contact working with ETS David has been working in investor relations for several months already and previously worked in Wholesale North America David will attend the weekly ETS staff meetings and will likely be tapping you for data and ideas for presentations His contact information is as follows David Leboe EB A Phone Fax As most of you know I will be working in Risk Analysis and Control starting June I will have a new extension soon if you need to reach me Yoli Mendez at x can track me down Scott

Contact Info for Liz Ivers Cc note to make sure everyone has the required contact information for the new investor relations contact for EOTT Energy Liz Ivers EB Phone Fax I have enjoyed working with each of you and hope we stay in touch My existing extension will have a recording with directing investors to Liz for EOTT questions I will have a new extension beginning June but I do not unfortunately have the number yet My email address will not change Scott
